#include <iostream.h>
class nails
{
	private:
		long int a,b,l;
		int ans;
	public:
		void get_data()
		{
			cin>>a>>b>>l;
		}
		void process()
		{
			long int c;
			c=l%(a+b);
			if(c==0)
				ans=1;
			else if(c<=a)
				ans=0;
			else
				ans=1;
		}
		void display()
		{
			if(ans==1)
				cout<<"Anish"<<endl;
			else
				cout<<"Aman"<<endl;
		}
};
int main()
{
	nails n;
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	for(;t>0;t--)
	{
		n.get_data();
		n.process();
		n.display();
	}
	return 0;
}
